metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1027 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The version checking subroutine in percona-toolkit before 2.2.13 andxtrabackup before 2.2.9 was vulnerable to silent HTTP downgrade attacks andMan In The Middle attacks in which the server response could be modified toallow the attacker to respond with modified command payload and have theclient return additional running configuration information leading to aninformation disclosure of running configuration of MySQL.

criterions.comment: percona-toolkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
percona-xtrabackup: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
